abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32951046, pmid32932556, pmid32936215, pmid32894404, pmid32937008, pmid32902581, pmid32706954, pmid32955126, pmid32932534, pmid32935958, pmid32894686
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.24
